reviewText: This is a sexy video! I can't think of anything I dislike about it. All four of these are smoking hot! Especially Brooke! She's my favorite! It really turns me on when they strip down to nothing and continue playing pool. They don't let the hot humid weather stand in their way. My favorite scene is in the end when they go skinny-dipping in the "cool pool"! I would love to be in the water with them.

This video has 4 VERY  beautiful women playing a game of pool together in a room that becomes warmer and warmer. the girls begin to sweat, and slowly remove all of their clothing.

One of the girls, Nikki, is the most attractive of all four.

Pure TITillation!!
